attributes.action: Extend the exam time for GCSE English Language Paper 2
attributes.background: It is true that GCSE courses have been edited to make it harder to achieve higher grades, so that these grades hold more value. However, as a student, I believe that the exam times should be extended to reflect their increased difficulty, as to allow students to answer to the best of their ability.

rejection.details: This is the responsibility of exam boards, not the UK Government or Parliament.
